screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .xcf.gz file in GIMP 3
screenshot.caption: XCF.GZ file open in GIMP 3

description: GIMP users can export XCF images as archives with different types of compression. Besides gzip compression, you can export XCF images as archives compressed with bzip2 ( .XCF.BZ2 and .XCFBZ2 files) and XZ ( .XCF.XZ and .XCFXZ files) compression.
To export an XCF file as an XCF.GZ file, follow these steps:
NOTE: XCF.GZ files may also be saved as .XCFGZ files.
